articles.author: Ricky Charlesworth
articles.title: Carlos Corberan gives update on Josh Koroma injury along with new Huddersfield Town concern - Yorkshire Live
articles.description: The Terriers' star man exited the action early in the win over Sheffield Wednesday
articles.content:
Carlos Corberan fears red-hot Josh Koroma will be missing for Huddersfield Town's weekend trip to Bournemouth.
 Winger Koroma notched his seventh goal of the season, and his third in as many home ga… [+2585 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Beasley
articles.title: Liverpool may already have £20m Gini Wijnaldum replacement - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: If Liverpool midfielder Gini Wijnaldum chooses to leave the club at the end of his contract, the club could find themselves with an extremely difficult task of trying to find a suitable replacement
articles.content: If you were to try to name the first Liverpool player to score a counter attacking goal in the Premier League this season, or the one who might break the Reds duck from outside the box in the same co… [+4063 chars]
